aquarium.items

Class MobileItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • aquarium.items.AquariumItem
      • aquarium.items.MobileItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StableFish

    public abstract class MobileItem
extends AquariumItem
    A MobileItem is an AquariumItem capable of changing its position (e.g., fish)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MobileItem(int minWidth, int maxWidth, java.lang.String imagePath)
      Constructs a Mobile Item of random width between minWidth and maxWidth using the image at imagePath
      MobileItem(int width, java.lang.String imagePath)
      Constructs a Mobile Item of a given width using the image at imagePath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AquariumItem getCurrentDestination() 
      abstract AquariumItem getCurrentTarget() 
      abstract int getMaximalWidth() 
      abstract AquariumItem getNewTarget(java.util.List<AquariumItem> neighbours) 
      void move()
      Makes a move towards the destination which is inversely proportional to the size of the Mobile Item
      void move(java.util.List<AquariumItem> neighbours)
      Moves to the current destination, if reached, change to another destination using MobileItem#getNewtarget(List) method on neighbours parameter

      • Methods inherited from class aquarium.items.AquariumItem

        draw, getPosition, getWidth, intersects, outline, overlap, setPosition, sink

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
